name: UpdateDatadogAppKey
description:
Edit a Datadog application key by ID.

Use this tool to update details of a specific Datadog application key by providing its ID. Useful for modifying configurations or permissions of the application key.

parameters.name: application_key_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Datadog application key that needs to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the application key.

parameters.name: app_key_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Datadog application key to be edited.

parameters.name: application_keys_resource_type
parameters.description: Fixed value for the resource type, which should always be 'application_keys'.

parameters.name: application_key_name
parameters.description: Name of the application key to be updated.

parameters.name: application_key_scopes
parameters.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key. Each scope is a string specifying a permission level.

value_schema.description: Array of scopes to grant the application key.
